name: Pim & the Naga
description:
Play as Pim and help save your village from a flood by adventuring to meet the great Naga! Use your lucky spear to fight your way up the river and collect special powers, but you never know what you’ll get because every power is a roll of the dice.

Minstrel Studios

All art, sound and music is made by the team.

  • Code Commander – Adam Bardsley
  • Scope Crusher and Script Kiddie – Seth Bardsley
  • Writey man & Animation mule – Alex Bardsley
  • Starving Artist – Britt Bardsley
  • Artist who stole the food – Jessica Flake Stricklan
  • Shouty man & Level Designer – Ben Bardsley
  • Story & Setting – Gabriella Maskovich
  • The Piano Man – Ruth Bardsley

In Game Font: VCR OSD Mono by Riciery Leal
